programlisting: <entry id="treppenwitz" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/ns/dmlex-1.0"> <headword>Treppenwitz</headword> <partOfSpeech tag="n-masc"/> <sense id="treppenwitz-1"> <headwordExplanation langCode="en"> <text> belated realisation of what one could have said </text> </headwordExplanation> <headwordTranslation langCode="en"> <text>staircase wit</text> </headwordTranslation> </sense> </entry>
